basic_info.description: Aku Satrya foundernya Zero-Inside. Aku biasa main di full-stack developer, network administration, data scientist, IoT system sama robotics. Selain aku programmer sama hardware developers, Aku juga bisa edit gambar sama buat video.

projects.title: GPON Network Monitoring System
projects.description: Developed information system and telegram bot for checking GPON status and optical information.

experience.company: Aeromodelling and Payload Telemetry Research Group (APTRG)
experience.title: Supervisor
experience.description: Ex-Head of Ground Control System Division

experience.title: International Leadership Development
experience.description: Contributed in education quality SDG 3 of Sawasdee 33 Project in Petchaburi, Thailand.

experience.company: Balai Besar Bahan dan Barang Teknik (B4T)
experience.title: Programming Internship
experience.description: Developed Odoo RFID Module of Warehouse Monitoring.

experience.title: Machine Learning Lecturer's Assistant
experience.description: Became assistant for grading weekly programming task IF-39-05, IF-39-12, and IF-39-INT.

experience.title: UAV Engineering
experience.description: Learned how to create resin based materials for UAV.

experience.title: Information Technology Support Technician
experience.description: Became technician for monitoring and maintenance network devices.

education.name: Master of Engineering, Control Engineering and Intelligent System

achievement.name: Best Innovation on Technology Development KRTI 2018
achievement.description: I developed a drone that has hand gesture control, people counting, and SLAM. Indonesia Flying Robot Competition (KRTI) held by Indonesian Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education

achievement.name: APICTA 2018 Indonesia Delegation
achievement.description: Participant as FALTO team on internet of things category, research-and-development category, and health care category. We developed fall prediction system for eldery people

achievement.name: Best Design on Internet of Things Telkom University Competition
achievement.description: I developed an early warning system for tea plantation with drone automation

achievement.name: Second Winner on Internet of Things Challenge Competition Electrical Engineering Days ITB
achievement.description: I developed a hybrid power system that combined solar cells, vibration power, and electromagnetic wave for powering Weather Station with GIS Application

achievement.name: Third Winner Fixed Wing on KRTI 2017
achievement.description: I developed a flying wing for mapping mission on fixed wing category. Indonesia Flying Robot Competition (KRTI) is held by Indonesian Ministry of Research, Technology, and Higher Education

achievement.name: Third Winner Balloon Atmosphere on KOMURINDO-KOMBAT 2017
achievement.description: I developed cyber physical system and GCS web application for capturing atmosphere data. KOMURINDO-KOMBAT is held by National Institute of Aeronautics and Space (LAPAN)

achievement.name: Participant on National IT Network System Administration (LKS SMK)
achievement.description: I configured a packet tracer network then linux and windows client-server network with iptables firewall, VPN, DNS-server, samba-server, DHCP-server, web-server, mail-server, proxy-server, and FTP server.

achievement.name: First Winner on North Sumatera IT Network System Administration (LKS SMK)
achievement.description: I configured a linux client-server network with iptables firewall, DNS-server, samba-server, DHCP-server, web-server, mail-server, proxy-server, and FTP server.

achievement.description: I configured a linux client-server network with iptables firewall, DNS-server, samba-server, DHCP-server, web-server, mail-server, proxy-server, and FTP server.

achievement.description: I configured a linux client-server network with iptables firewall, DNS-server, samba-server, DHCP-server, web-server, mail-server, proxy-server, and FTP server.
